tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE rides (
    ride_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    ride_start TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    ride_end TIMESTAMP,
    distance FLOAT,
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE rides (
    ride_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    pickup_location VARCHAR(255),
    dropoff_location VARCHAR(255),
    ride_distance DECIMAL(10,2),
    ride_duration INT,
    ride_cost DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_name VARCHAR(255),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15),
    signup_date DATE 
);

CREATE TABLE payments (
    payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    ride_id INT,
    payment_date DATE,
    amount DECIMAL(10,2),
    payment_status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE usage_data (
    usage_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT REFERENCES billing_customers(customer_id),
    ride_distance DECIMAL,
    ride_duration INT,
    ride_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE AutonomousVehicles (
   vehicle_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
   vehicle_type TEXT,
   vehicle_color TEXT,
   battery_capacity INT,
   last_location POINT
);

CREATE TABLE Rides (
   ride_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
   vehicle_id UUID,
   start_time TIMESTAMP,
   end_time TIMESTAMP,
   total_distance FLOAT
);
